thread.title: Ortho Country Orthodontics Introduces Newest Team Member, Dr. Ruben Alcazar
thread.title_full: Ortho Country Orthodontics Introduces Newest Team Member, Dr. Ruben Alcazar

title: Ortho Country Orthodontics Introduces Newest Team Member, Dr. Ruben Alcazar
text: Ortho Country Orthodontics Introduces Newest Team Member, Dr. Ruben Alcazar By PR Newswire | 10/23/15 - 10:13 AM EDT Reprint MCMINNVILLE, Ore. , Oct. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Dedicated to becoming the number one choice for orthodontic care in Yamhill County , Ortho Country Orthodontics ( http://www.orthocountry.com/ ) is making strides to better serve the local Hispanic community. The office has taken a giant step forward with the hiring of Dr. Ruben Alcazar . Originally from Peru and fluent in Spanish, Dr. Alcazar will help Ortho Country communicate its value to a larger share of people - many of whom will benefit from professional, top-shelf orthodontic care. Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151023/279936Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151023/279937 "I consider myself fortunate to have the opportunity to work in a profession that is rewarding for both my patients and myself," says Dr. Alcazar. "The best part about being an orthodontist is building personal relationships with each patient and to witness how the patient's overall attitude and confidence changes positively as we improve their smile during treatment."Dr. Alcazar is the son of a dentist himself, so caring for people's smiles is something that's virtually in his blood. He earned his Dental Degree and his first Orthodontic Certificate in his homeland of Peru . Later, he earned his second Orthodontic Certificate from the Jacksonville University School of Orthodontics in Florida , where he also taught for three years before moving to the Pacific Northwest. Dr. Alcazar is well connected to the world of orthodontics and its many caring doctors. He is a diplomate of the American Board of Orthodontics. His current professional society memberships include the American Association of Orthodontics and the Pacific Coast Society of Orthodontics. Outside of his professional work, Dr. Alcazar has already explored the countless opportunities for fun and recreation offered by Yamhill County and the surrounding region. "I like watching and practicing sports: tennis, racquetball, ping-pong and soccer are among my favorites," he says. "I enjoy spending time with my daughter and exploring all the outdoor activities that Oregon has to offer, like biking, hiking, kayaking, and camping, as well as traveling and discovering new places. McMinnville has truly made my family feel welcome."At Ortho Country Orthodontics, Dr. Alcazar joins an exceptional staff in a well-appointed and inviting office environment. Thanks to the office's close relationship with the adjacent Ortho Classic manufacturing facility, Dr. Alcazar will have access to all the most exciting innovations in the "science of smiles." 1 of 2
